volumeInfo.title: Batman
volumeInfo.subtitle: Year One: Two-Face and Scarecrow
volumeInfo.description: Featuring characters from the blockbuster movie The Dark Knight, Batman Year One: Two-Face and Scarecrow takes back to the crime-ridden streets of Gotham, as the Caped Crusader hunts down two of his dangerous enemies! Former professor Jonathan Crane has mastered the grim art of instilling terror as the Scarecrow, and one-time Gotham District Attorney Harvey Dent, driven mad by his disfigurement at the hands of a mob boss, has become the duality-obsessed villain Two-Face! But can the Dark Knight stop these insane criminals?

searchInfo.textSnippet: Featuring characters from the blockbuster movie The Dark Knight, Batman Year One: Two-Face and Scarecrow takes back to the crime-ridden streets of Gotham, as the Caped Crusader hunts down two of his dangerous enemies!
